name: Aadhaar Inclusive Development for Agriculture and Rural Infrastructure Development (AID-ARID)
briefDescription: Aadhaar Inclusive Development for Agriculture and Rural Infrastructure Development (AID-ARID) is a socially motivated organization formed in 2004 as a Society. AID-ARID is the result of a group of likeminded professionals from across mainstream and development sectors (engineering, research, consulting, investment banking, agriculture, textiles, healthcare and social sciences) joining hands for a common vision: Strengthen rural infrastructure and induce empowerment for sustainable livelihoods. AID-ARID strives to assist, promote and encourage several rural initiatives and institutes and inject new technological interventions in development projects. To achieve this, we at AID-ARID, collaborate with and create enterprises:
